snob.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: someone who thinks they are better than people from a lower social class – used to show disapproval
snob.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: I don’t want to sound like a snob, but I thought she was vulgar.
snob.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: someone who thinks they are better than other people because they know more about something – used to show disapproval
